data.scripts.bounty

Class MagicBountyCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.scripts.bounty.MagicBountyCoordinator

  • public final class MagicBountyCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object
    The point of entry into MagicBounty scripting. Contains methods for getting all or specific ActiveBountys, as well as general bounty management logic. 
     Usage: MagicBountyCoordinator.getInstance()
    Author:
    Wisp

      • onGameLoad

        public static void onGameLoad()

      • getActiveBounties

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ActiveBounty> getActiveBounties()
        Returns a map (bounty key, bounty) of all active bounties. Note that this does not necessarily mean that they have been accepted, just that they've been inflated from json (like being instantiated).

      • getActiveBounty

        @Nullable
public ActiveBounty getActiveBounty(@NotNull
                                    java.lang.String bountyKey)
        Gets a single active bounty by key.

      • shouldShowBountyBoardAt

        public boolean shouldShowBountyBoardAt(@Nullable
                              com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ.MarketAPI marketAPI)
        Whether or not a market is a viable candidate for showing the bounty board. Takes into account blacklisting of locations.

      • getBountiesWithChanceToSpawnAtMarketById

      • setBlockBountyAtMarket

        public void setBlockBountyAtMarket(@NotNull
                          com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ.MarketAPI marketAPI,
                          @NotNull
                          java.lang.String bountyId)
        Marks the bounty as blocking a slot on the market until expiration (default 30 days). Until expiration, another bounty cannot take that slot. This prevents accepting all bounties from a market at once.

      • getMarketBountyBoardGenSeed

        public int getMarketBountyBoardGenSeed(@NotNull
                              com.fs.starfarer.api.campaign.econ.MarketAPI marketAPI)
        Gets the seed used to generate bounties at the given market. This seed will change every 30 days. Unless the player times it to save scum just as the seed changes, this should prevent it.

      • createActiveBounty

        public ActiveBounty createActiveBounty(java.lang.String bountyKey,
                              MagicBountyData.bountyData spec)

      • configureBountyListeners

        public void configureBountyListeners()
        Idempotently ensures that each `ActiveBounty` has a `MagicBountyBattleListener` running.
